name: T6_tornado_storm
prompt: Spawn a storm of particles that spins items around

visual_expectations.description: A dense cloud of particles/points swirling in a circular or spiral pattern

verify.code: () => { const entities = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.animals; const storm = entities.find(e => e.constructor.name === 'ParticleEntity' || (e.particles && e.particles.length > 50)); if (!storm) return { success: false, message: 'Particle storm not found' }; return { success: true, message: `Found storm with ${storm.particles ? storm.particles.length : 'N/A'} particles` }; }
